attributes.additional_details: Scam Fake Government Websites are set up to dupe citizens into using them instead of .gov.uk websites such as HMRC, Passport office and to apply for EHIC cards. These sites charge exorbitant fees for what should be free services by the government!! I want rid of these sites to ensure the citizens of Great Britain are protected against fraudsters!!

rejection.details: Allegations of fraud are an operational policing matter.
